name: Chourei
desc: A Melusine who maintains order at the port.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
All sorts of people enter and leave the harbor, and there is no lack of ill-tempered folks among them who often get into altercations with others. As one who must keep order, Chourei needs to mediate such conflicts, despite her desire to only lead a peaceful life. Thanks to some inspiration from the harbormaster, she started requesting that conflicting parties settle things over Genius Invokation TCG, with the losing party being bid not to make a fuss — a method that has seen impressive results. Slowly, Chourei became quite the hobbyist herself.
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: You will not use your own deck, but a preset deck named "Eruption of Energies Ravenous" instead.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Neuvillette
customize.desc:
"Ordainer of Inexorable Judgment" Neuvillette

He who looks down on all that are haughty.

customize.name: Baizhu
customize.desc:
"Beyond Mortality" Baizhu

Living with many maladies, where will one find a cure?

customize.name: Yae Miko
customize.desc:
"Astute Amusement" Yae Miko

The wise and beautiful Yae Miko.

customize.name: Consecrated Flying Serpent
customize.desc:
Remnant Squall: Consecrated Flying Serpent

A flying serpent that became twisted and warped by eating some great being. Now, it commands the fearsome winds.

customize.name: Consecrated Scorpion
customize.desc:
Remnant Venom: Consecrated Scorpion

A poisonous scorpion that became twisted and warped by eating some great being. It now commands perilous lightning.

customize.name: Yelan
customize.desc:
"Valley Orchid" Yelan

The world is vast and infinite, the solitary one comes and goes as she pleases.

customize.name: End of the Line
customize.desc:
Net Snapper: End of the Line

"...The fish that once shot forth like an arrow across a huge lake on the plateau,

That would stretch out as straight as a spear, cruising back and forth between the sacred sites,

Would see its stream seep into the sand, its lake shrink into a puddle,

Till at last, it wound up curled in a little plash, at the mercy of passing pilgrims."

customize.name: Timmie
customize.desc:
"Pure Patience" Timmie

"Will pigeons that have flown away come back?"

customize.name: Mushroom Pizza
customize.desc:
Mushroom Pizza

They say that a researcher once used very precise calculations to uncover the "fairest way to cut pizza," but as the process is far too bothersome, basically no one uses it…

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...
